comment: Use this file to configure MapDiffBot. Requires a restart of the container to take effect

General.comment: Set this value if you want to limit the number of concurrent dmm-tools processes. 0 is unlimited

Database.comment: Change the following to true if you're using MySQL/MariaDB
Database.comment_2: The connection string must specify a database. The login must initially have the right to create said database. Once run for the first time, you may remove that right

GitHub.comment: Copy and place your pem file in this volume and then fill out the following
GitHub.comment_2: The following should be set to your GitHub app ID
